title: Robot Monster 1953 - Moon Monsters Declare War on Humanity! - Earth’s Last Stand

sources.title: Robot Monster 1953 - Moon Monsters Declare War on Humanity! - Earth’s Last Stand
sources.description:
One little family stands between Earth and cosmic “Ro-mance” gone wrong.
Professor (John Mylong), and his family Alice (Claudia Barrett), Roy (George Nader), Johnny (Gregory Moffett), and Carla (Pamela Paulson) – are the last humans alive on Earth, hunted by the relentless  Ro-Man , but finds himself falling for their beautiful daughter Alice. The alien invaders bizarre fascination with Alice sparks rebellion against his cosmic commander, The Great Guidance, jeopardizing his entire mission!

Title: Robot Monster (1953) AKA: Monster from Mars / Monsters from the Moon

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/9TanVzG1FVw

Director: Phil Tucker
Writer: Wyott Ordung
Main cast: George Nader, Claudia Barrett, Selena Royle, John Mylong, Gregory Moffett, George Barrows,

Genres: Comedy, Horror, Sci-Fi
Release date: June 24, 1953 
Filming location: Bronson Canyon, California, USA


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics
